Jekyll Notes

Sep 23, 2023

Setup

GitHub Codespace

I had stumbled on some problems in my local macbook (symlink and ruby, gem version related) so I put my code on Codespace instead. Following the guides from the Giraffe guy, there’s a change need to be done for Codespace setup for the sake of user permission (I guess?)

References

  • Jekyll’s GitHub repo, https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll
